summary:
I do kinda wonder what it's like to be someone who's designed, developed or built something that you later realise was bad for humanity? Like, at the time it felt right, you didn't see problems with it, but later you're just like "whelp, I fucked up"

I imagine it must be a very depressing and isolating feeling.

(I've luckily so far never had this happen to me)
